7. Data sharing
Can data not be deposited in data repositories to make them available for reuse? Have a look for suitable repositories: https://elixir-europe.org/platforms/data/elixir-deposition-databases ;  https://rdmkit.elixir-europe.org/bioimaging_data

or there is KU Leuven RDR: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr
label: good with suggestions
